custom_nodes.author: amorano
custom_nodes.title: Jovimetrix Composition Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Composition nodes like Substance Designer heavily inspired by WAS and MTB Node Suites

custom_nodes.author: romeobuilderotti
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PNG Metadata
custom_nodes.description: Add custom Metadata fields to your saved PNG files.

custom_nodes.author: ka-puna
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-yanc
custom_nodes.description: NOTE: Concatenate Strings, Format Datetime String, Integer Caster, Multiline String, Truncate String. Yet Another Node Collection, a repository of simple nodes for ComfyUI. This repository eases the addition or removal of custom nodes to itself.

custom_nodes.author: TheBarret
custom_nodes.title: ZSuite
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Prompter, RF Noise, SeedMod.

custom_nodes.author: palant
custom_nodes.title: Extended Save Image for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This custom node is largely identical to the usual Save Image but allows saving images also in JPEG and WEBP formats, the latter with both lossless and lossy compression. Metadata is embedded in the images as usual, and the resulting images can be used to load a workflow.

custom_nodes.author: LonicaMewinsky
custom_nodes.title: ComfyBreakAnim
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:BreakFrames, GetKeyFrames, MakeGrid.

custom_nodes.author: gemell1
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_GMIC
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:GMIC Image Processing.

custom_nodes.author: peteromallet
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Creative-Interpolation [Beta]
custom_nodes.description: This a ComfyUI node for batch creative interpolation. The goal is to allow you to input a batch of images, and to provide a range of simple settings to control how the images are interpolated between.

custom_nodes.author: martijnat
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-previewlatent
custom_nodes.description: a ComfyUI plugin for previewing latents without vae decoding. Useful for showing intermediate results and can be used a faster 'preview image' if you don't wan't to use vae decode.

custom_nodes.author: whmc76
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Openpose-Editor-Plus
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Openpose Editor Plus

custom_nodes.author: Off-Live
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-off-suite
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Image Crop Fit Node, OFF SEGS to Image, Crop Center wigh SEGS, GW Number Formatting Node.

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: LCMSampler-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This extension node is intended for the use of LCM conversion for SSD-1B-anime. It does not guarantee operation with the original LCM (as it cannot load weights in the current version). To take advantage of fast generation with LCM, a node for using TAESD as a decoder is also provided. This is inspired by ComfyUI-OtherVAEs.

custom_nodes.author: palant
custom_nodes.title: Integrated Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This tool will turn entire workflows or parts of them into single integrated nodes. In a way, it is similar to the Node Templates functionality but hides the inner structure. This is useful if all you want is to reuse and quickly configure a bunch of nodes without caring how they are interconnected.

custom_nodes.author: palant
custom_nodes.title: Image Resize for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This custom node provides various tools for resizing images. The goal is resizing without distorting proportions, yet without having to perform any calculations with the size of the original image. If a mask is present, it is resized and modified along with the image.

custom_nodes.author: M1kep
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-KepOpenAI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-KepOpenAI is a user-friendly node that serves as an interface to the GPT-4 with Vision (GPT-4V) API. This integration facilitates the processing of images coupled with text prompts, leveraging the capabilities of the OpenAI API to generate text completions that are contextually relevant to the provided inputs.

custom_nodes.author: bmad4ever
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_ab_sampler
custom_nodes.description: Experimental sampler node. Sampling alternates between A and B inputs until only one remains, starting with A. B steps run over a 2x2 grid, where 3/4's of the grid are copies of the original input latent. When the optional mask is used, the region outside the defined roi is copied from the original latent at the end of every step.

custom_nodes.author: AbyssYuan0
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_BadgerTools
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:ImageOverlap-badger, FloatToInt-badger, IntToString-badger, FloatToString-badger, ImageNormalization-badger, ImageScaleToSide-badger, NovelToFizz-badger.

custom_nodes.author: fexli
custom_nodes.title: fexli-util-node-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:FEImagePadForOutpaint, FEColorOut, FEColor2Image, FERandomizedColor2Image

custom_nodes.author: nagolinc
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FastVAEDecorder_SDXL
custom_nodes.description: Based off of: Birch-san/diffusers-play/approx_vae. This ComfyUI node allows you to quickly preview SDXL 1.0 latents.

custom_nodes.author: jags111
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Jags_VectorMagic
custom_nodes.description: a collection of nodes to explore Vector and image manipulation

custom_nodes.author: Trung0246
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-0246
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Highway, Junction. Random nodes for ComfyUI I made to solve my struggle with ComfyUI. Have varying quality.

custom_nodes.author: PCMonsterx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader
custom_nodes.description: CSV Loader for prompt building within ComfyUI interface. Allows access to positive/negative prompts associated with a name. Selections are being pulled from CSV files.

custom_nodes.author: IAmMatan.com
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Serving toolkit
custom_nodes.description: This extension adds nodes that allow you to easily serve your workflow (for example using a discord bot)

custom_nodes.author: ParmanBabra
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Malefish-Custom-Scripts
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Multi Lora Loader, Random (Prompt), Combine (Prompt), CSV Prompts Loader

custom_nodes.author: mikkel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - Mask Bounding Box
custom_nodes.description: The ComfyUI Mask Bounding Box Plugin provides functionalities for selecting a specific size mask from an image. Can be combined with ClipSEG to replace any aspect of an SDXL image with an SD1.5 output.

custom_nodes.author: THtianhao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FaceChain
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:FC_LoraMerge.

custom_nodes.author: noEmbryo
custom_nodes.title: noEmbryo nodes
custom_nodes.description: PromptTermList (1-6): are some nodes that help with the creation of Prompts inside ComfyUI. Resolution Scale outputs image dimensions using a scale factor. Regex Text Chopper outputs the chopped parts of a text using RegEx.

custom_nodes.author: aianimation55
custom_nodes.title: Comfy UI FatLabels
custom_nodes.description: It's a super simple custom node for Comfy UI, to generate text, with a font size option. Useful for bigger labelling of nodes, helpful for wider screen captures or tutorials. Plus you can of course use the text within your generations.

custom_nodes.author: idrirap
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Lora-Auto-Trigger-Words
custom_nodes.description: This project is a fork of https://github.com/Extraltodeus/LoadLoraWithTags The aim of these custom nodes is to get an easy access to the tags used to trigger a lora.

custom_nodes.author: jags111
custom_nodes.title: Efficiency Nodes for ComfyUI Version 2.0+
custom_nodes.description:
A collection of ComfyUI custom nodes to help streamline workflows and reduce total node count.

NOTE: This node is originally created by LucianoCirino, but the original repository is no longer maintained and has been forked by a new maintainer. To use the forked version, you should uninstall the original version and REINSTALL this one.

custom_nodes.author: M1kep
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OtherVAEs
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: TAESD VAE Decode

custom_nodes.author: Fictiverse
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Fictiverse Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Color correction.

custom_nodes.author: kinfolk0117
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SimpleTiles
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:TileSplit, TileMerge.

custom_nodes.author: CaptainGrock
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUIInvisibleWatermark
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Apply Invisible Watermark, Extract Watermark. Adds up to 12 characters encoded into an image that can be extracted.

custom_nodes.author: apesplat
custom_nodes.title: ezXY scripts and nodes
custom_nodes.description:
Extensions/Patches: Enables linking float and integer inputs and ouputs. Values are automatically cast to the correct type and clamped to the correct range. Works with both builtin and custom nodes.

NOTE: This repo patches ComfyUI's validate_inputs and map_node_over_list functions while running. May break depending on your version of ComfyUI. Can be deactivated in config.yaml.

Nodes: A collection of nodes for facilitating the generation of XY plots. Capable of plotting changes over most primitive values.

custom_nodes.author: noxinias
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_NoxinNodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Noxin Complete Chime, Noxin Scaled Resolutions, Load from Noxin Prompt Library, Save to Noxin Prompt Library

custom_nodes.author: taabata
custom_nodes.title: LCM_Inpaint-Outpaint_Comfy
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for inpainting/outpainting using the new latent consistency model (LCM)

custom_nodes.author: 0xbitches
custom_nodes.title: Latent Consistency Model for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This custom node implements a Latent Consistency Model sampler in ComfyUI. (LCM)

custom_nodes.author: flowtyone
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-flowty-lcm
custom_nodes.description:
This is a comfyui early testing node for LCM, adapted from https://github.com/0xbitches/sd-webui-lcm. It uses the diffusers backend unfortunately and not comfy's model loading mechanism. But the intention here is just to be able to execute lcm inside comfy.
NOTE: 0xbitches's 'Latent Consistency Model for ComfyUI' is original implementation.

custom_nodes.author: aszc-dev
custom_nodes.title: Core ML Suite for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This extension contains a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that allow you to use Core ML models in your ComfyUI workflows. The models can be obtained here, or you can convert your own models using coremltools. The main motivation behind using Core ML models in ComfyUI is to allow you to utilize the ANE (Apple Neural Engine) on Apple Silicon (M1/M2) machines to improve performance.

custom_nodes.author: Fannovel16
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI MotionDiff
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of MDM, MotionDiffuse and ReMoDiffuse into ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ostris
custom_nodes.title: Ostris Nodes ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that I made for some QOL. I will be adding much more advanced ones in the future once I get more familiar with the API.

custom_nodes.author: city96
custom_nodes.title: Extra Models for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This extension aims to add support for various random image diffusion models to ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: shadowcz007
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-mixlab-nodes [WIP]
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: RandomPrompt, TransparentImage, LoadImageFromPath, Splitting a long image into sections, ImagesCrop, Consistency Decoder Loader, Consistency Decoder Decode

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Prompt Info
custom_nodes.description: Prompt Info

custom_nodes.author: drustan-hawk
custom_nodes.title: primitive-types
custom_nodes.description: A text-to-speech plugin used under ComfyUI. It utilizes the Microsoft Speech TTS interface to convert text content into MP3 format audio files.

custom_nodes.author: chflame163
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_MSSpeech_TTS
custom_nodes.description: A text-to-speech plugin used under ComfyUI. It utilizes the Microsoft Speech TTS interface to convert text content into MP3 format audio files.

custom_nodes.author: zer0TF
custom_nodes.title: Cute Comfy
custom_nodes.description: Adds a configurable folder watcher that auto-converts Comfy metadata into a Civitai-friendly format for automatic resource tagging when you upload images. Oh, and it makes your UI awesome, too. 💜

custom_nodes.author: xXAdonesXx
custom_nodes.title: NodeGPT
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of AutoGen inside ComfyUI. This repository is under development, and not everything is functioning correctly yet.

custom_nodes.author: DigitalIO
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-stable-wildcards
custom_nodes.description: Wildcard implementation that can be reproduced with workflows.

custom_nodes.author: THtianhao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:RetainFace, FaceFusion, RatioMerge2Image, MaskMerge2Image, ReplaceBoxImg, ExpandMaskBox, FaceSkin, SkinRetouching, PortraitEnhancement, ...

custom_nodes.author: chibiace
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Chibi-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Loader, Prompts, ImageTool, Wildcards, LoadEmbedding, ConditionText, SaveImages, ...

custom_nodes.author: YMC
custom_nodes.title: ymc-node-suite-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: ymc 's nodes for comfyui. This extension is composed of nodes that provide various utility features such as text, region, and I/O.

custom_nodes.author: spinagon
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-seam-carving
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Image Resize (seam carving). Seam carving (image resize) for ComfyUI. Based on https://github.com/li-plus/seam-carving. With seam carving algorithm, the image could be intelligently resized while keeping the important contents undistorted. The carving process could be further guided, so that an object could be removed from the image without apparent artifacts.

custom_nodes.author: Smuzzies
custom_nodes.title: Chatbox Overlay node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Chatbox Overlay. Custom node for ComfyUI to add a text box over a processed image before save node.

custom_nodes.author: FizzleDorf
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AIT
custom_nodes.description:
A ComfyUI implementation of Facebook Meta's AITemplate repo for faster inference using cpp/cuda. This new repo is behind the old version but is a much more stable foundation to keep AIT online. Please be patient as the repo will eventually include the same features as before.
NOTE: You can find the old AIT extension in the legacy channel.

custom_nodes.author: chrish-slingshot
custom_nodes.title: CrasH Utils
custom_nodes.description: A mixture of effects and quality of life nodes. Nodes: ImageGlitcher (gives an image a cool glitchy effect), ColorStylizer (highlights a single color in an image), QueryLocalLLM (queries a local LLM API though oobabooga), SDXLReslution (resolution picker for the standard SDXL resolutions, the complete list), SDXLResolutionSplit (splits the SDXL resolution into width and height).

custom_nodes.author: whatbirdisthat
custom_nodes.title: cyberdolphin
custom_nodes.description: Cyberdolphin Suite of ComfyUI nodes for wiring up things.

custom_nodes.author: a1lazydog
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
custom_nodes.description: Load mp3 files and use the audio nodes to power animations and prompt scheduling. Use with FizzNodes.

custom_nodes.author: storyicon
custom_nodes.title: segment anything
custom_nodes.description: Based on GroundingDino and SAM, use semantic strings to segment any element in an image. The comfyui version of sd-webui-segment-anything.

custom_nodes.author: catscandrive
custom_nodes.title: Image loader with subfolders
custom_nodes.description: Adds an Image Loader node that also shows images in subfolders of the default input directory

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: LoRA-Merger-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Load LoRA Weight Only, Load LoRA from Weight, Merge LoRA, Save LoRA. This extension provides nodes for merging LoRA.

custom_nodes.author: avatechai
custom_nodes.title: avatar-graph-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A custom nodes module for creating real-time interactive avatars powered by blender bpy mesh api + Avatech Shape Flow runtime.

custom_nodes.author: mikkel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - Text Overlay Plugin
custom_nodes.description: The ComfyUI Text Overlay Plugin provides functionalities for superimposing text on images. Users can select different font types, set text size, choose color, and adjust the text's position on the image.

custom_nodes.author: SOELexicon
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LexTools
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LexTools is a Python-based image processing and analysis toolkit that uses machine learning models for semantic image segmentation, image scoring, and image captioning.

custom_nodes.author: thedyze
custom_nodes.title: Save Image Extended for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Customize the information saved in file- and folder names. Use the values of sampler parameters as part of file or folder names. Save your positive & negative prompt as entries in a JSON (text) file, in each folder.

custom_nodes.author: hhhzzyang
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Lama
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: LamaaModelLoad, LamaApply, YamlConfigLoader. a costumer node is realized to remove anything/inpainting anything from a picture by mask inpainting.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: WAS_Extras
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Conditioning (Blend), Inpainting VAE Encode (WAS), VividSharpen. Experimental nodes, or other random extra helper nodes.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Image to Text Node
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Image URL to Text, Image to Text.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Comfy UI Online Loaders
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Submit Image (Parameters), Submit Image. A collection of loaders that use a shared common online data source rather than relying on the files to be present locally.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Comfy AI DoubTech.ai Image Sumission Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyAI submit node to upload images to DoubTech.ai

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Comfy UI QR Codes
custom_nodes.description: This extension introduces QR code nodes for the Comfy UI stable diffusion client. NOTE: ComfyUI qrcode extension required.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Variables for Comfy UI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: String, Int, Float, Short String, CLIP Text Encode (With Variables), String Format, Short String Format. This extension introduces quality of life improvements by providing variable nodes and shared global variables.

custom_nodes.author: kijai
custom_nodes.title: KJNodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Various quality of life -nodes for ComfyUI, mostly just visual stuff to improve usability.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: ASTERR
custom_nodes.description:
Abstract Syntax Trees Evaluated Restricted Run (ASTERR) is a Python Script executor for ComfyUI.

Warning:ASTERR runs Python Code from a Web Interface! It is highly recommended to run this in a closed-off environment, as it could have potential security risks.

custom_nodes.author: Zuellni
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PickScore Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Image scoring nodes for ComfyUI using PickScore with a batch of images to predict which ones fit a given prompt the best.

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Use Everywhere (UE Nodes)
custom_nodes.description: A set of nodes that allow data to be 'broadcast' to some or all unconnected inputs. Greatly reduces link spaghetti.

custom_nodes.author: azazeal04
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Styles
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Anime_Styler, Fantasy_Styler, Gothic_Styler, Line_Art_Styler, Movie_Poster_Styler, Punk_Styler, Travel_Poster_Styler. This extension offers 8 art style nodes, each of which includes approximately 50 individual style variations.

custom_nodes.author: city96
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ColorMod
custom_nodes.description: This extension currently has two sets of nodes - one set for editing the contrast/color of images and another set for saving images as 16 bit PNG files.
